alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Central Oregon Coast; Central Willamette Valley; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 05 at 3:44PM PST until December 07 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Oregon, including the following areas, Central Coast Range of Western Oregon, Central Oregon Coast, Central Willamette Valley, Coast Range of Northwest Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area, Lower Columbia and North Oregon Coast and southwest Washington, including the following areas, Greater Vancouver Area, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County, South Washington Cascade Foothills, South Washington Coast and Willapa Hills. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Area creeks and rivers are running high and could flood with more heavy rain. Rivers of particular concern to reach flood stage include the Luckiamute and South Yamhill in the west-central Willamette Valley and the Cowlitz River at Kelso in Cowlitz County. Note that flood warnings are already in effect for several rivers along the North Oregon Coast and in Southwest Washington. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - An additional 1 to 2 inches of rain is expected this afternoon and overnight. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for additional Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Central Oregon Coast; Central Willamette Valley; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia; North Oregon Coast
